description: Defines the scope, key terms, and applicability of the law (including the Small Business exemption).
Establishes the five core rights (Access, Correction, Deletion, Portability, Opt-Out) and the appeal process.

subchapter_name: Controller and Processor Data-Related Duties and Prohibitions
description: Outlines obligations for security, privacy notices, data protection assessments, and contract requirements.
Grants exclusive authority to the Attorney General and establishes the 30-day cure period.

subchapter_name: Construction of Chapter; Exemptions for Certain Uses
description: Provides legal safe harbors for complying with other laws (HIPAA, GLBA) and law enforcement inquiries.
